name: ELVAM
short_description: Our project, ELVAM, aims to propose a package allowing amateur artists to practice video mapping.  Our pack is composed of a video projector, an external controller, a sound card and our software HeavyM. This software manages the audio analysis and extract the main components of music. These components are then sent to the "video renderer" that can associate them with different effects such as segmentation of faces, color change, rotation opposite edges of ignition. The artist can interact in real time and at any time during the delivery, with the software to change the effects.
summary: ELVAM is a package allowing artists to practice video-mapping
